profileSectionTitle.fieldDescription: Title to show within the initial view of the Profile component.
profileSectionTitle.name: ./profileSectionTitle

linkTitlePersonalDetails.fieldDescription: Title of the Personal Details link.
linkTitlePersonalDetails.name: ./linkTitlePersonalDetails

requiredFieldsText.fieldDescription:
Required field indicator text. This text will appear on all forms and will explain to the user that fields marked with asterisk are required.
The required field indicator text will appear at the bottom of every form that contains required fields.
E.g.: - required field
requiredFieldsText.name: ./requiredFieldsText

personalDetailsSectionTitle.fieldDescription: Title of the Personal Details section within the Profile component.
personalDetailsSectionTitle.name: ./personalDetailsSectionTitle

included.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if this field should be included on the form.
included.name: ./email/included

label.fieldDescription: Label shown next to the field.
label.name: ./email/label

placeholder.fieldDescription: In-Field Text to display within the text input field.
placeholder.name: ./email/placeholder

required.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if this field should be required.
required.name: ./email/required

requiredError.fieldDescription: Error message to show when required field validation fails.
requiredError.name: ./email/requiredError

validationRegEx.fieldDescription: Regular expression for front end input field value validation.
validationRegEx.name: ./email/validationRegEx

validationRegExError.fieldDescription: Error message to show when RegEx field validation fails. Will only be used if RegEx is provided.
validationRegExError.name: ./email/validationRegExError

description.fieldDescription: Description to show below the form field. This could include explanation of the expected format.
description.name: ./email/description

note.fieldDescription: Text to show when user clicks the 'Why?' link. If text is provided, the 'Why?' link will be displayed.
note.name: ./email/note

included.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if this drop down should be included on the form.
included.name: ./prefix/included

label.fieldDescription: Label to show next to the drop down.

required.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if this drop down should be required.
required.name: ./prefix/required

requiredError.fieldDescription: Error message to show when required drop down validation fails.
requiredError.name: ./prefix/requiredError

options.fieldDescription:
For each option, include the value (which is saved to the database) followed by double colon :: followed by label (which is displayed to the user).
E.g.: databaseValue::Displayable Label
options.name: ./prefix/options

fieldConfig.fieldDescription:
For each option, include the value (which is saved to the database) followed by double colon :: followed by label (which is displayed to the user).

note.fieldDescription:
There is an option to include two checkboxes below the Mailing Address form fields: 'Use as Billing Address' and 'Use as Delivery Address'. When user checks the checkbox, values from Mailing Address fields will be copied to Billing Address and Delivery Address respectively.
These checkboxes will only be included, if a Mailing Address is also included and if their labels are populated below.
note.name: ./mailingAddress/note

labelUseAsBilling.fieldDescription:
Label to show next to the 'Use as Billing Address' checkbox.
If not populated, the checkbox will not be included on the form.
labelUseAsBilling.name: ./mailingAddress/labelUseAsBilling

labelUseAsDelivery.fieldDescription:
Label to show next to the 'Use as Delivery Address' checkbox.
If not populated, the checkbox will not be included on the form.
labelUseAsDelivery.name: ./mailingAddress/labelUseAsDelivery
